00042 public enum SequenceColumn {

00047     COUNT("#") {
00048         {
00049             toolTipText = "Number of the measurement step";
00050         }
00051 
00052         @Override public StyledWrapper getValue(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00053             StyledWrapper wrapper = headerWrapper;
00054             if (project != null && project.getSteps() > rowIndex) {
00055                 wrapper.value = new Integer(rowIndex + 1);
00056             } else {
00057                 //wrapper.value = ">"; // greater-than sign
00058                 wrapper.value = "\u00BB"; // right-pointing double angle quotation mark
00059                 //wrapper.value = "\u2192"; // rightwards arrow
00060                 //wrapper.value = "\u25BA"; // black right-pointing pointer
00061             }
00062             return wrapper;
00063         }
00064     },
00065 
00069     STEP("Step Value"){
00070         {
00071             // one decimal is the maximum presision
00072             getNumberFormat().setMaximumFractionDigits(1);
00073         }
00074 
00075         @Override public StyledWrapper getValue(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00076             if (rowIndex >= project.getSteps()) {
00077                 return wrap(null, rowIndex, project);
00078             }
00079             double value = project.getStep(rowIndex).getStepValue();
00080             if (value < 0.0) {
00081                 return wrap(null, rowIndex, project);
00082             }
00083             return wrap(getNumberFormat().format(value), rowIndex, project);
00084         }
00085 
00086         @Override public void setValue(Object data, int rowIndex, Project project) {
00087             if (project == null) {
00088                 return;
00089             }
00090             if (data != null && !(data instanceof Number)) {
00091                 if (data.toString().equals("")) {
00092                     data = null;
00093                 } else {
00094                     try {
00095                         data = getNumberFormat().parse(data.toString());
00096                     } catch (ParseException e) {
00097 //                        throw new NumberFormatException("For input string: \"" + data.toString() + "\"");
00098                         return;
00099                     }
00100                 }
00101             }
00102             double value = data != null ? ((Number) data).doubleValue() : -1.0;
00103 
00104             if (rowIndex >= project.getSteps()) {
00105                 // add new row
00106                 if (value < 0.0) {
00107                     return;
00108                 }
00109                 MeasurementStep step = new MeasurementStep(project);
00110                 step.setStepValue(value);
00111                 project.addStep(step);
00112             } else {
00113                 // edit an existing row (the editing of completed steps is prevented by isCellEditable)
00114                 project.getStep(rowIndex).setStepValue(value);
00115             }
00116         }
00117 
00118         @Override public boolean isCellEditable(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00119             if (rowIndex >= project.getSteps()) {
00120                 return true;    // the last row
00121             }
00122             if (project.getStep(rowIndex).getState() == MeasurementStep.State.READY) {
00123                 return true;    // uncompleted steps
00124             }
00125             return false;       // completed steps
00126         }
00127 
00128         @Override public String getColumnName(Project project) {
00129             final String AF_COLUMN_NAME = "AF (mT)";
00130             final String TEMP_COLUMN_NAME = "T (\u00b0C)";
00131 
00132             if (project == null) {
00133                 return AF_COLUMN_NAME;
00134             }
00135             String s;
00136             switch (project.getType()) {
00137             case AF:
00138             case CALIBRATION:
00139                 s = AF_COLUMN_NAME;
00140                 break;
00141             case THELLIER:
00142             case THERMAL:
00143                 s = TEMP_COLUMN_NAME;
00144                 break;
00145             default:
00146                 assert false;
00147                 s = "";
00148                 break;
00149             }
00150             return s;
00151         }
00152 
00153         @Override public String getToolTipText(Project project) {
00154             final String AF_TOOL_TIP = "Intensity of the alternating-field demagnetization";
00155             final String TEMP_TOOL_TIP = "Temperature used for demagnetization";
00156 
00157             if (project == null) {
00158                 return AF_TOOL_TIP;
00159             }
00160             String s;
00161             switch (project.getType()) {
00162             case AF:
00163             case CALIBRATION:
00164                 s = AF_TOOL_TIP;
00165                 break;
00166             case THELLIER:
00167             case THERMAL:
00168                 s = TEMP_TOOL_TIP;
00169                 break;
00170             default:
00171                 assert false;
00172                 s = null;
00173                 break;
00174             }
00175             return s;
00176 
00177         }
00178     },

00183     MASS("Mass"){ // unit is grams
00184         {
00185             // at least 5 decimals
00186             getNumberFormat().setMaximumFractionDigits(6);
00187             toolTipText = "Mass of the sample (grams)";
00188         }
00189 
00190         @Override public StyledWrapper getValue(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00191             if (rowIndex >= project.getSteps()) {
00192                 return wrap(null, rowIndex, project);
00193             }
00194             double value = project.getStep(rowIndex).getMass();
00195             if (value < 0.0) {
00196                 value = project.getMass();
00197             }
00198             if (value < 0.0) {
00199                 return wrap(null, rowIndex, project);
00200             }
00201             return wrap(getNumberFormat().format(value), rowIndex, project);
00202         }
00203 
00204         @Override public void setValue(Object data, int rowIndex, Project project) {
00205             if (project == null) {
00206                 return;
00207             }
00208             if (data != null && !(data instanceof Number)) {
00209                 if (data.toString().equals("")) {
00210                     data = null;
00211                 } else {
00212                     try {
00213                         data = getNumberFormat().parse(data.toString());
00214                     } catch (ParseException e) {
00215 //                        throw new NumberFormatException("For input string: \"" + data.toString() + "\"");
00216                         return;
00217                     }
00218                 }
00219             }
00220             double value = data != null ? ((Number) data).doubleValue() : -1.0;
00221 
00222             if (rowIndex < project.getSteps()) {
00223                 project.getStep(rowIndex).setMass(value);
00224             }
00225         }
00226 
00227         @Override public boolean isCellEditable(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00228             if (rowIndex < project.getSteps()) {
00229                 return true;
00230             }
00231             return false;
00232         }
00233     },

00407         @Override public String getColumnName(Project project) {
00408             String[] units = value.getUnit().split(",");
00409             if (project == null || project.getNormalization() == Project.Normalization.VOLUME) {
00410                 return value.getCaption() + " (" + units[0] + ")";
00411             } else if (project.getNormalization() == Project.Normalization.MASS) {
00412                 return value.getCaption() + " (" + units[1] + ")";
00413             } else {
00414                 assert false;
00415                 return null;
00416             }
00417         }
00418     },
00419     RELATIVE_MAGNETIZATION(MeasurementValue.RELATIVE_MAGNETIZATION) {
00420         {
00421             getNumberFormat().setMinimumFractionDigits(3);
00422             getNumberFormat().setMaximumFractionDigits(3);
00423         }
00424     },
00425     THETA63(MeasurementValue.THETA63) {
00426         {
00427             // one decimal should be enough
00428             getNumberFormat().setMinimumFractionDigits(1);
00429             getNumberFormat().setMaximumFractionDigits(1);
00430         }
00431     };

00433     /* Styles for the cell renderer */
00434 
00435     private static final StyledWrapper defaultWrapper = Settings.getDefaultWrapperInstance();
00436     private static final StyledWrapper measuringWrapper = Settings.getMeasuringWrapperInstance();
00437     private static final StyledWrapper doneRecentlyWrapper = Settings.getDoneRecentlyWrapperInstance();
00438     private static final StyledWrapper headerWrapper = new StyledWrapper();
00439     private static final Border editableCellBorder =
00440             BorderFactory.createMatteBorder(1, 1, 1, 1, new Color(0xEEEEFF));
00441     private static final Border editableCellFocusBorder =
00442             BorderFactory.createMatteBorder(1, 1, 1, 1, new Color(0x9999CC));
00443 
00444     static {
00445         // align all fields to right
00446         defaultWrapper.horizontalAlignment = SwingConstants.TRAILING;
00447         measuringWrapper.horizontalAlignment = SwingConstants.TRAILING;
00448         doneRecentlyWrapper.horizontalAlignment = SwingConstants.TRAILING;
00449         headerWrapper.horizontalAlignment = SwingConstants.TRAILING;
00450 
00451         // styles for the COUNT column
00452         Color headerBackground = new Color(0xE1E1E1);
00453         Border headerBorder = BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(1, 2, 1, 2);
00454         headerWrapper.opaque = true;
00455         headerWrapper.background = headerBackground;
00456         headerWrapper.selectedBackground = headerBackground;
00457         headerWrapper.focusBackground = headerBackground;
00458         headerWrapper.selectedFocusBackground = headerBackground;
00459         headerWrapper.border = headerBorder;
00460         headerWrapper.selectedBorder = headerBorder;
00461         headerWrapper.focusBorder = headerBorder;
00462         headerWrapper.selectedFocusBorder = headerBorder;
00463     }

00467     protected String columnName;
00468 
00469     protected String toolTipText;
00470 
00471     protected MeasurementValue value;
00472 
00473     protected NumberFormat numberFormat;
00474 
00475     private SequenceColumn(String columnName) {
00476         this.columnName = columnName;
00477         this.toolTipText = null;
00478         this.value = null;
00479         this.numberFormat = NumberFormat.getNumberInstance();
00480         this.numberFormat.setGroupingUsed(false);
00481     }
00482 
00483     private SequenceColumn(MeasurementValue value) {
00484         if (value.getUnit().equals("")) {
00485             this.columnName = value.getCaption();
00486         } else {
00487             this.columnName = value.getCaption() + " (" + value.getUnit() + ")";
00488         }
00489         this.toolTipText = value.getDescription();
00490         this.value = value;
00491         this.numberFormat = NumberFormat.getNumberInstance();
00492         this.numberFormat.setGroupingUsed(false);
00493     }
00494 
00499     public static SequenceColumn[] getAllColumns() {
00500         return new SequenceColumn[]{
00501             COUNT,
00502             STEP,
00503             VOLUME,
00504             MASS,
00505             SUSCEPTIBILITY,
00506             DECLINATION,

00510             THETA63,
00511             MOMENT,

00513             GEOGRAPHIC_X_NORMALIZED,
00514             GEOGRAPHIC_Y,
00515             GEOGRAPHIC_Z,
00516             SAMPLE_X,
00517             SAMPLE_Y,
00518             SAMPLE_Z
00519         };
00520     }

00530     public StyledWrapper wrap(Object value, int rowIndex, Project project) {
00531 
00532         // choose the style according to the state of the step
00533         StyledWrapper wrapper;
00534         if (project == null || rowIndex >= project.getSteps()) {
00535             wrapper = defaultWrapper;
00536         } else {
00537             switch (project.getStep(rowIndex).getState()) {
00538             case READY:
00539             case DONE:
00540                 wrapper = defaultWrapper;
00541                 break;
00542             case MEASURING:
00543                 wrapper = measuringWrapper;
00544                 break;
00545             case DONE_RECENTLY:
00546                 wrapper = doneRecentlyWrapper;
00547                 break;
00548             default:
00549                 assert false;
00550                 wrapper = null;
00551                 break;
00552             }
00553         }
00554 
00555         // visible border for editable cells
00556         if (isCellEditable(rowIndex, project)) {
00557             wrapper.border = editableCellBorder;
00558             wrapper.selectedBorder = editableCellBorder;
00559             wrapper.focusBorder = editableCellFocusBorder;
00560             wrapper.selectedFocusBorder = editableCellFocusBorder;
00561         } else {
00562             wrapper.border = null;
00563             wrapper.selectedBorder = null;
00564             wrapper.focusBorder = null;
00565             wrapper.selectedFocusBorder = null;
00566         }
00567 
00568         // wrap the cell's value and return it
00569         wrapper.value = value;
00570         return wrapper;
00571     }
00572 
00582     public StyledWrapper getValue(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00583         if (value == null || rowIndex >= project.getSteps()) {
00584             return wrap(null, rowIndex, project);
00585         }
00586         Object obj = project.getValue(rowIndex, value);
00587         if (obj == null || !(obj instanceof Number)) {
00588             return wrap(obj, rowIndex, project);
00589         }
00590 
00591         // format the return value with NumberFormatter
00592         double doubleValue = ((Number) obj).doubleValue();
00593         String formatted = getNumberFormat().format(obj);
00594 
00595         // check for Infinity and NaN
00596         if (formatted.charAt(0) == 65533) { // for some reason "doubleValue == Double.NaN" doesn't work
00597             formatted = "NaN";
00598         } else if (doubleValue == Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY) {
00599             formatted = "\u221e";
00600         } else if (doubleValue == Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY) {
00601             formatted = "-\u221e";
00602         }
00603         return wrap(formatted, rowIndex, project);
00604     }
00605 
00614     public void setValue(Object data, int rowIndex, Project project) {
00615         // DO NOTHING
00616     }
00617 
00626     public boolean isCellEditable(int rowIndex, Project project) {
00627         return false;
00628     }

00637         return columnName;
00638     }
00639 
00647     public String getToolTipText(Project project) {
00648         return toolTipText;
00649     }
00650 
00655     public Class<?> getColumnClass() {
00656         return StyledWrapper.class;
00657     }
00658 
00662     public NumberFormat getNumberFormat() {
00663         return numberFormat;
00664     }
00665 
00671     public void setNumberFormat(NumberFormat numberFormat) {
00672         if (numberFormat == null) {
00673             throw new NullPointerException();
00674         }
00675         this.numberFormat = numberFormat;
00676     }
